com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart.plotter

Class PlotterContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart.plotter.PlotterContext

  • public class PlotterContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Context information about the plot task.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int availablewidthPerDataItem
      The calculated available width per data item, at least 1.
      private int chartHeight
      Calculated chart height.
      private java.awt.Insets chartInsets
      Calculated chart insets.
      private JChartPlotter chartPlotter
      Chart plotter.
      private int chartWidth
      Calculated chart width
      private int dataItemWidth
      The calculated data item (candlestick or bar) width.
      private PlotData plotData
      The plot data.

      Constructor and Description

      Constructor assinging the context values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Insets getChartInsets()
      Returns the chart insets calculated using the inset factors.
      ChartPlotParameters getChartPlotParameters()
      Returns the chart plot parameters.
      JChartPlotter getChartPlotter()
      Returns the parent chart plotter.
      java.awt.Dimension getChartSize()
      Returns the chart plotter size.
      int getCoordinateX(double index)
      Returns the X coordinate where starts the area to plot the data of index, given the index of the data, the start index, the end index, the left inset and the plot area width.
      int getCoordinateY(double value)
      Returns the Y coordinate, starting at the top of the paint area, given the value, the maximum and minimum visible values, the top inset, the plot area height, once removed top and bottom insets, and the plot scale.
      int getDataIndex(int x)
      Returns the index on the data given the x coordinate in the plot area.
      int getDataItemWidth()
      Returns the candlestick or bar width.
      double getDataValue(int y)
      Returns the data value given the y coordinate in the plot area.
      int getDrawingCenterCoordinateX(int x)
      Returns the coordinate of the drawing center for a bar, candle, line or histogram, given the starting X coordinate.
      HorizontalAxisPlotParameters getHorizontalAxisPlotParameters()
      Returns the horizontal axis plot parameters.
      PlotData getPlotData()
      Returns the plot data.
      Session getSession()
      Returns the working session.
      VerticalAxisPlotParameters getVerticalAxisPlotParameters()
      Returns the axis plot parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getChartSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getChartSize()
        Returns the chart plotter size.
        Returns:
        The chart plotter size.

      • getChartInsets

        public java.awt.Insets getChartInsets()
        Returns the chart insets calculated using the inset factors.
        Returns:
        The insets.

      • getCoordinateX

        public int getCoordinateX(double index)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Returns the X coordinate where starts the area to plot the data of index, given the index of the data, the start index, the end index, the left inset and the plot area width.
        Parameters:
        index - The data index.
        Returns:
        The X coordinate.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the data index is not between the start and the end indexes.

      • getCoordinateY

        public int getCoordinateY(double value)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Returns the Y coordinate, starting at the top of the paint area, given the value, the maximum and minimum visible values, the top inset, the plot area height, once removed top and bottom insets, and the plot scale.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to retrieve its Y coordinate.
        Returns:
        The Y coordinate for the argument value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the value is not in the maximum-minimum value range.

      • getDataIndex

        public int getDataIndex(int x)
        Returns the index on the data given the x coordinate in the plot area. The returned index is greater than or equal to PlotData.startIndex and less equal than PlotData.endIndex.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate in the plot area.
        Returns:
        The index on the data.

      • getDataItemWidth

        public int getDataItemWidth()
        Returns the candlestick or bar width.
        Returns:
        The candlestick or bar width.

      • getDataValue

        public double getDataValue(int y)
        Returns the data value given the y coordinate in the plot area. The returned value is greater than or equal to PlotData.minimumValue and less equal than PlotData.maximumValue.
        Parameters:
        y - The y coordinate in the plot area.
        Returns:
        The data value.

      • getDrawingCenterCoordinateX

        public int getDrawingCenterCoordinateX(int x)
        Returns the coordinate of the drawing center for a bar, candle, line or histogram, given the starting X coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - The starting x coordinate.
        Returns:
        The verical line X coordinate.

      • getPlotData

        public PlotData getPlotData()
        Returns the plot data.
        Returns:
        The plot data.

        Returns the axis plot parameters.
